subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Rhonda's Folder/Odd thumping sound.mp3 
  Uploaded by : rhondak1973 <rhondak1973@...> 
  Description : Im not sure what this is exactly, its only heard once on my entire session...sounds almost old leather covered drum being pounded. i looked around my desk and there is NOTHING that could make that same sound. Do you all hear it? 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Rhonda%27s%20Folder/Odd%20thumping%20sound.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

rhondak1973 <rhondak1973@...>
